entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM NDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 26 March 2023
